sentence: His maternal grandparents,  John Glacken and the former Margaret McGowan, who left County Donegal  and Derry, Northern Island respectively, for America at different times  in the early 1900s.

This is $181 million to keep our rural hospitals' doors open, upgrade  critical infrastructure, expand access to emergency care, protect  maternal health, and strengthen Tribal health services.
South Dakota will also be using its funding to create regional hubs  for emergency services and to improve access to maternal and infant  health, to ensure delivery of essential medical care.

The  State is looking to recruit healthcare professionals to rural areas and  train professionals for rural needs, incentivize regional hubs for  emergency services and maternal health, and bolster healthcare  facilities that serve rural parts of our State.
